description:
1. User dapat mengedit profile channel : 
- nama channel
- channel type
- total member sama dengan jumlah member yang join channel
- who can see/remove to channel
- purpose
2. button cancel pada modal edit channel berfungsi
3. button close pada modal edit channel berfungsi

steps.name: # click more dot - channel info on header
# verify button cancel on edit channel is working
# verify button cancel on edit channel is working
# verify button cancel on edit channel is working
# verify button close on edit channel is working
# verify button cancel on edit channel is working
# change who can invite/remove to channel
# verify name channel on channel info same with name channel on header chat room after change
# verfy change channel type is working
